com.ibm.team.scm.client

Interface IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOpFactory

  • Enclosing interface:
    IFlowNodeConnection

    public static interface IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOpFactory
    Factory for creating operations that modify the components within a workspace or stream.
    Since:
    0.6 (RTC 1.0)
    See Also:
    IFlowNodeConnection.applyComponentOperations(List, IProgressMonitor)
    Restriction:
    Clients should not implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp, boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
      Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace without an initial seed.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp, IConnection seed, boolean produceDetailedUpdated)
      Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using another workspace or stream as the initial seed.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp, IConnection seed, IWorkspaceHandle operationSource, boolean produceDetailedUpdated)
      Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using another workspace or stream as the initial seed.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp, com.ibm.team.scm.common.IHistoryReference history, boolean details)
      Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using the given history reference as the initial seed.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentDeletionOp removeComponent(IComponentHandle comp, boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
      Return an operation object for removing a component from the workspace.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp, IConnection seed, boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
      Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp, IConnection seed, IWorkspaceHandle operationSource, boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
      Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace.
      IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp, com.ibm.team.scm.common.IHistoryReference history, boolean details)
      Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace using the given history reference as the initial seed.

    • Method Detail

      • addComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                    boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
        Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace without an initial seed.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.

      • addComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                    IConnection seed,
                                                    boolean produceDetailedUpdated)
        Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using another workspace or stream as the initial seed.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        seed - The workspace or baseline connection to use as a seed; must not be null.
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.

      • addComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                    IConnection seed,
                                                    IWorkspaceHandle operationSource,
                                                    boolean produceDetailedUpdated)
        Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using another workspace or stream as the initial seed.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        seed - The workspace or baseline connection to use as a seed; must not be null.
        operationSource - a workspace handle which should be considered the source of the seed, may be null
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.
        Since:
        0.11.0.2 (RTC 6.0.2)

      • addComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentAdditionOp addComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                    com.ibm.team.scm.common.IHistoryReference history,
                                                    boolean details)
        Return an operation object for adding a component to the workspace using the given history reference as the initial seed.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        history - The history reference to use as a seed; must not be null.
        details - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.
        Since:
        0.11.0.4 (RTC 6.0.4)

      • removeComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentDeletionOp removeComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                       boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
        Return an operation object for removing a component from the workspace.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.

      • replaceComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                           IConnection seed,
                                                           boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
        Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        seed - A connection to use as a seed; must not be null.
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.

      • replaceComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                           IConnection seed,
                                                           IWorkspaceHandle operationSource,
                                                           boolean produceDetailedUpdates)
        Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        seed - A connection to use as a seed; must not be null.
        operationSource - a workspace handle which should be considered the source of the seed, may be null
        produceDetailedUpdates - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.
        Since:
        0.11.0.2 (RTC 6.0.2)

      • replaceComponent

        IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentReplacementOp replaceComponent(IComponentHandle comp,
                                                           com.ibm.team.scm.common.IHistoryReference history,
                                                           boolean details)
        Return an operation object for replacing a component in the workspace using the given history reference as the initial seed.
        Parameters:
        comp - The component handle; must not be null.
        history - The history reference to use as a seed; must not be null.
        details - true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.
        Returns:
        an opaque operation object that can be passed to applyComponentOperations; never null.
        Since:
        0.11.0.4 (RTC 6.0.4)
